reviewText: Wonderful way to entertain the children and still have them learn Godly lessons.  We thouroughly enjoyed this movie.
My nephew LOVES these Hermie videos and DVD's and I feel great that he learns good principles while enjoying these entertaining stories.
My kids love all the Hermie and Friends DVD.  This was another great DVD to add to our collection.  The theme about sharing is an excellent one for kids to focus on.

Each Hermie and Friends video is packed with timeless truth for kids and parents alike.  In this episode, the bugs learn that teamwork and caring for one another is much better that acting selfishly.  Greed and envy are ugly and cause problems, but sharing and working together brings harmony.

No, life isn't perfect in the garden, and each lesson teaches kids how to deal with real pressures of life and sin.  Children adore the great animation and excellent voice talents.  Kudos to the writers, producers and actors who make these videos a hit!
Good kids movie teaching great christian values while keeping the childs interest
It was was as described.  My kids like buzz bee.
Love this product! Great for kids!
